bg.x2d.anim
Class DilationSegment

java.lang.Object
  bg.x2d.anim.DilationSegment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Segment
public class DilationSegment
extends Object
implements Segment

Segment that scales the AffineTransform of this Graphics object based on x,y scale factors, time duration and size of the canvas being draw upon (optional).

Since:
2DX 1.0 (1st Edition)
Author:
Brian Groenke

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface bg.x2d.anim.Segment
INTERVAL_UNDEF
 
Constructor Summary
DilationSegment(double scalex, double scaley, Dimension contextSize, long duration)
          Creates a new DilationSegment that will keep objects centered when scaling using the given contextSize.
DilationSegment(double scalex, double scaley, long duration)
          Creates a new DilationSegment that makes no attempt to keep objects centered when scaling.
DilationSegment(double scale, long duration)
          Creates a new DilationSegment that makes no attempt to keep objects centered when scaling and uses the same x and y scale factors.

Constructor Detail

DilationSegment

public DilationSegment(double scalex,
                       double scaley,
                       Dimension contextSize,
                       long duration)
Creates a new DilationSegment that will keep objects centered when scaling using the given contextSize. DilationSegment is immutable, but changes made to the passed Dimension object will be reflected upon the scaling operation.

Parameters:
scalex -
scaley -
contextSize -
duration -

DilationSegment

public DilationSegment(double scalex,
                       double scaley,
                       long duration)
Creates a new DilationSegment that makes no attempt to keep objects centered when scaling. Calls DilationSegment(scalex,scaley,null,duration).

Parameters:
scalex -
scaley -
duration -
See Also:
DilationSegment(double,double,Dimension,long)

DilationSegment

public DilationSegment(double scale,
                       long duration)
Creates a new DilationSegment that makes no attempt to keep objects centered when scaling and uses the same x and y scale factors. Calls DilationSegment(scale,scale,null,duration).

Parameters:
scale -
duration -
See Also:
DilationSegment(double,double,Dimension,long)

Description copied from interface: Segment
Fetches the time duration of this Segment.

Specified by:
getDuration in interface Segment
Returns:
the time duration in milliseconds.

getUpdateInterval

public double getUpdateInterval()
This implementation returns the average between the x and y scale factors.

Specified by:
getUpdateInterval in interface Segment
Returns:
the interval value for each milisecond of time in this Segment or INTERVAL_UNDEF if undefined.

getXInterval

public double getXInterval()

getYInterval

public double getYInterval()

transform

public void transform(AffineTransform affine,
                      Transform tf)
Scales this AfineTransform the appropriate amount since the last call in the time frame. If the context size was specified, a translation will be enacted to keep the objects centered.

Specified by:
transform in interface Segment
tf - data for ongoing transformations

Description copied from interface: Segment

Returns:
